episode.title: The Scotland Board of Tourism
episode.rawTitle: 329: ‘The Scotland Board of Tourism’, With David Smith
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest David Smith returns to the show to talk about Apple Watch Series 7 and the state of WatchOS, Apple suing NSO Group, and more.
episode.showNotes:
